description:
I haven't had lots of time to investigate everything this app can do but it sure looks promising. I've been a long-time user of Puddletag but ever since they started distributing it through the Snap Store, you can't access music files from external drives. All part of the "genius" design of Snap files.

So I'll stick with Kid3 for now. I may go back in my archives and install the Puddletag .deb file from an older version in case Kid3 doesn't have the features I got used to using in Puddletag. But so far, it looks very good.
summary: Seems to do everything you'd ever want it to

description: It looked very promising, but when I went to 'Open' a file, the dialog box was wider than my Desktop, (default Ubuntu 22.04.01) and I couldn't select/change the files. Had to kill it with a crowbar.  Seems like a minor bug, but a flat tire will still keep the car from rolling.
I used to use mp3tag, and this programme fills it's place nicely
Extensive functionality, intuitive interface, and "just works"
I was able to remove Comments and do stuff easily that I was pulling my hair out trying to figure out with Musicbrainz Picard. Thank you so much. Great tool for Tagging collections.
Once you figure out how this app works, it's super easy to use. Don't waste your time with Picard - I lost a whole morning trying to figure it out, without success.
This is a simple, intuitive and feature-rich app to edit and work with audio & video file tags. It works very well. I recommend it.
Un gran editor de etiquetas para archivos de audio. Una interfaz sencilla, intuitiva y muy fácil de utilizar.
no arranca esta version ni de deb ni flatpak, si lo instalas en synaptic si que funcion pero es la version anterior no la nueva
summary: no arranca en debian esta version

description: Va perfecto en Ubuntu esta ultima version, gracias...
summary: En Ubuntu SI funciona bien esta ultima version
